block.p: A music listing on Page 33 of Arts & Leisure today for Lincoln Center Festival 2000 misstates the days for two events in the ''Caribbean Roots: Caribbean Routes'' series and omits one event. ''Nyabinghi Spirit: The Heartbeat of Reggae'' is tomorrow at 9, not today. ''Griots of the West Indies: Dub Poetry and Calypso'' is Thursday at 8, not Wednesday. The listing omits ''Mizik Racine and the Rhythm of Vodou'' with Boukman Eksperyans, Wednesday at 9 at the Society for Ethical Culture, Central Park West at 64th Street.
